product_name: Salomon XT Zip-Off Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Converting from jacket to vest in a flash, the men's Salomon XT Zip-Off jacket protects you from wind and light rain while remaining breathable enough to prevent overheating. Wind-resistant fabric also wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly, helping keep your skin cool and dry even when you start to sweat. Single piece of fabric incorporating the sleeves and shoulders zips off and instantly turns the jacket into a vest. Vest features mesh panels on shoulders, increasing ventilation. Full-length zipper allows easy on/off; zippered pocket stashes sleeves and stores energy gels, ID or media player. Thumbholes keep sleeves in place; reflective logos on front and back increase visibility in low light. The active fit of the Salomon XT Zip-Off jacket skims the body without being too tight. Closeout.
